headline: Haste, and Caution, on Bryant News
abstract: TMZ drew a rebuke from a Los Angeles official after going first with the story of the former N.B.A. starâ€™s death. Some other reports turned out to be false.
lead_paragraph: The gossip and celebrity news site TMZ was first with the news that Kobe Bryant had died Sunday in a helicopter crash near Calabasas, Calif. The report was so early, in fact, that many social media users questioned its accuracy.
